test_message: Generate a 6-day Protein-Focused meal plan for Indian vegetarian/eggetarian cuisine. Include eggs and paneer as preferred ingredients. Focus on South Indian breakfast recipes with variety from North Indian and Continental dishes for lunch. Provide complete nutritional breakdown and shopping list.
expected_purpose: Orchestrates complete meal planning workflow - researches recipes, curates 6-day meal plan, generates shopping list and nutrition summary. Response should contain meal_plan with days array, shopping_list with categories, and nutrition_summary with weekly totals and macro split.

breakfast.name: Egg Vegetable Dosa
breakfast.description: Crispy South Indian dosa topped with scrambled eggs and colorful vegetables, packed with protein and nutrients

lunch.name: Palak Paneer with Brown Rice
lunch.description: Creamy spinach curry with cottage cheese cubes served with fiber-rich brown rice, excellent iron and protein source

breakfast.name: Paneer Upma
breakfast.description: Traditional South Indian semolina breakfast elevated with protein-rich paneer chunks and mixed vegetables

lunch.name: Vegetable Hakka Noodles with Paneer
lunch.description: Indo-Chinese fusion noodles loaded with paneer and colorful vegetables in savory soy-based sauce

breakfast.name: Cheese Stuffed Idli
breakfast.description: Soft steamed rice cakes stuffed with melted cheese, a protein-rich twist on classic South Indian breakfast

lunch.name: Chana Masala with Jeera Rice
lunch.description: Protein-packed chickpea curry in spiced tomato gravy served with aromatic cumin-flavored rice

breakfast.name: Masala Dosa with Egg
breakfast.description: Classic crispy masala dosa enhanced with protein-rich egg layer, combining traditional and modern flavors

lunch.name: Vegetable Biryani with Raita
lunch.description: Fragrant layered rice dish with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices, served with cooling cucumber raita

breakfast.name: Egg Bhurji with Whole Wheat Toast
breakfast.description: Spiced scrambled eggs with onions and tomatoes, served with toasted whole wheat bread for sustained energy

lunch.name: Paneer Butter Masala with Roti
lunch.description: Rich and creamy cottage cheese curry in buttery tomato sauce, paired with soft whole wheat flatbreads

breakfast.name: Paneer Tikka Paratha
breakfast.description: Stuffed flatbread filled with marinated paneer tikka, combining tandoor flavors in a portable breakfast

lunch.name: Palak Paneer with Quinoa
lunch.description: Classic spinach-paneer curry served with protein-rich quinoa instead of rice for extra nutritional boost

items.name: Raita spices (roasted cumin, chat masala, etc.)
